sources.title: The Darkness Within
sources.description: A little surreal collage ofÂ  film noir, exploitation clips and sound... For more information about the artist go to: www.anonymouswaves.org ...and check out my other videos on the Internet Archive here: http://archive.org/search.php?query=subject%3A%22bob+georgeson%22&sort=-publicdate

metadata.Plot: A student wakes up ill and discovers a body hidden in his room. He hides the body in the woods but the activity weakens his health. Soon the student finds his appetite and body changing into the monster he feared he was.
